printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. As an additional cost to rez non-ice cards, the Corp must randomly trash a card from HQ.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is scored. As an additional cost to rez non-ice cards, the Corp must randomly trash a card from HQ.

flavor: Usually crashing with friends means sleeping on the couch. This time, it meant sleeping on a server farm.
printed_text: Off-Campus Apartment can host any number of connections. Whenever you install a connection on Off-Campus Apartment, draw 1 card.
stripped_printed_text: Off-Campus Apartment can host any number of connections. Whenever you install a connection on Off-Campus Apartment, draw 1 card.

flavor: "You can help Jinteki shape the future. Your future."
printed_text: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3[credit] less.
stripped_printed_text: Install 1 resource from your grip, paying 3 credits less.

printed_text: Place 4 power counters on Dorm Computer when you install it. [click], hosted power counter: Make a run. Avoid all tags for the remainder of the run.
stripped_printed_text: Place 4 power counters on Dorm Computer when you install it. click, hosted power counter: Make a run. Avoid all tags for the remainder of the run.

printed_text: The first time you install a card each turn, you may install another card of the same type from your grip (paying its install cost).
stripped_printed_text: The first time you install a card each turn, you may install another card of the same type from your grip (paying its install cost).

printed_text:
As an additional cost to play this event, spend [click].
If you have fewer cards in your grip than your maximum hand size, draw cards until you have cards in your grip equal to your maximum hand size.
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play this event, spend click. If you have fewer cards in your grip than your maximum hand size, draw cards until you have cards in your grip equal to your maximum hand size.

printed_text: +1[mu] The first time you play an event each turn, you may play another event (without spending a click) after the first one resolves. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu The first time you play an event each turn, you may play another event (without spending a click) after the first one resolves. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: "Once you download the lecture source files, this program does a statistical analysis and distills the most important concepts." -Hayley Kaplan
printed_text: Interface â†’ 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: Place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: Place 1 power counter on this program. This program gets +1 strength for each hosted power counter.

printed_text: Trash all programs hosted on London Library when your turn ends. [click]: Install a non-virus program from your grip on London Library, ignoring the install cost. [click]: Add a program on London Library to your grip.
stripped_printed_text: Trash all programs hosted on London Library when your turn ends. click: Install a non-virus program from your grip on London Library, ignoring the install cost. click: Add a program on London Library to your grip.

flavor: "There are whole generations of people who never move out of a megalopolis center. You should see the look on their face the first time they see the stars." -Professor Darren Fin, Astronomy
printed_text: [click], [click]: Search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.
stripped_printed_text: click, click: Search your stack for a piece of hardware, reveal it, and add it to your grip. Shuffle your stack.

flavor: "So much to do. So little time."
printed_text:
When your turn begins, lose [click].
Your maximum hand size is increased by 5.
stripped_printed_text: When your turn begins, lose click. Your maximum hand size is increased by 5.

flavor: "My research could make your corporation billions. And save lives, of course."
printed_text: When you score Research Grant, you may score another copy of Research Grant that is installed.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Research Grant, you may score another copy of Research Grant that is installed.

flavor: Alan Turing laid the foundation for artificial intelligence by suggesting that you could teach a computer to be human.
printed_text: Turing has +3 strength while protecting a remote server. The Runner cannot use AI programs to break subroutines on Turing. [subroutine] End the run unless the Runner spends [click][click][click].
stripped_printed_text: Turing has +3 strength while protecting a remote server. The Runner cannot use AI programs to break subroutines on Turing. Subroutine End the run unless the Runner spends click click click.

flavor: Crick and his colleagues ushered in modern genetics by mapping the structure of DNA.
printed_text:
Crick has +3 strength while protecting Archives.
[subroutine] Install a card from Archives (paying its install cost).
stripped_printed_text: Crick has +3 strength while protecting Archives. Subroutine Install a card from Archives (paying its install cost).

flavor: "My script can perform the Kobayashi algorithm in .12 seconds."
printed_text: Search R&D for up to X different sysops (by title), reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.
stripped_printed_text: Search R&D for up to X different sysops (by title), reveal them, and add them to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

flavor: Officially, there is no blacklist. That would be illegal. Unofficially, there is a list, and being on it can ruin a career.
printed_text: Cards cannot leave the Runner's heap for any reason.
stripped_printed_text: Cards cannot leave the Runner's heap for any reason.

flavor: Johannes Gutenberg ignited the first Information Revolution by inventing the movable-type printing press.
printed_text:
Gutenberg has +3 strength while protecting R&D.
[subroutine] <trace>Trace 7</trace> If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: Gutenberg has +3 strength while protecting R&D. Subroutine Trace 7 If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: The cost of an education is sometimes felt sharpest in the stomach.
printed_text: As an additional cost to play an event that there is a copy of in his or her heap, the Runner must pay 2[credit].
stripped_printed_text: As an additional cost to play an event that there is a copy of in his or her heap, the Runner must pay 2 credits.

flavor: Meru Mati pushed the limits of physics by engineering the first buckyweave structure, a thousand-foot long wall.
printed_text:
Meru Mati has +3 strength while protecting HQ.
[subroutine] End the run.
stripped_printed_text: Meru Mati has +3 strength while protecting HQ. Subroutine End the run.

flavor: After the Big One, real estate value changed sharply. Some found that they had become owners of beachfront property. Others were underwater.
printed_text: The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 5. Limit 1 region per server.
stripped_printed_text: The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 5. Limit 1 region per server.
